entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: The location where Harry is staying with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, a wizard who is staying with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who has left without saying goodbye.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry and Ron's friend, who is also staying with them.

relationships.description: Ron has left without saying goodbye to Harry.
Harry and Hermione are staying together in Godric's Hollow.
Ron has left Godric's Hollow, making it impossible for him to find Harry and Hermione again.
Hermione is also staying with Harry in Godric's Hollow.
